K10jnalokau:4: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
K10jnalokau:5: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate 'nantaratnaśikhare dharmadhātugarbhe prāsāde mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcaviṃśatibhir bhikṣusahasraiḥ /
K10jnalokau:6: sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niḥkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair
K10jnalokau:7: ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ
K10jnalokau:12: dhanaśriyā ca buddhiśriyā ca bhaiṣajyarājena ca bhaiṣajyasamudgatena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
K10jnalokau:24: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavata etad abhūt /
K10jnalokau:25: yan nv ahaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahājavabalavegasthāmasaṃjananārthaṃ dhārmīṃ kathāṃ kathayeyam,
K10jnalokau:26: yad gaṅgānadīvālikāsamebhyo lokadhātubhyo mahaujaskamahaujaskān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān saṃnipāteyam /
K10jnalokau:27: yan nv ahaṃ mahādharmanirdeśasya paridīpanāyai nimittam ādarśayeyam,
K10jnalokau:29: yan me bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āgatya mahādharmanirdeśaṃ paripṛccheyur iti /
K10jnalokau:30: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ daśasu dikṣv asaṃkhyeyācintyatrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamaṃ lokadhātuṃ mahāraśmimeghair avabhāsayati sma /
K10jnalokau:31: tena khalu punaḥ samayena daśabhyo digbhya ekaikasmād digbhāgād daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āgacchanti sma /
K10jnalokau:33: āgatya bhagavato 'nurūpām acintyāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā svakasvakapraṇidhānabalanirjāteṣu
K10jnalokau:38: tena khalu punaḥ samayena dharmadhātugarbhe prāsādamadhye mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsanaṃ prādurabhūt /
K10jnalokau:50: tasya ca mahāmaṇiratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsanasyopari samantād daśāsaṃkhyeyāni raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
K10jnalokau:51: te ca raśmayo daśasu dikṣv anyonyān lokadhātūn mahatāvabhāsena spharanti sma /
K10jnalokau:52: tena khalu punaḥ samayena daśadiśy ekaikasmād digbhāgād daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamā
K10jnalokau:67: āgatya ca bhagavato 'cintyātulyāmāpyāṃ parimāṇābhikrāntāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
K10jnalokau:69: niṣīdya bhagavantam animiṣaṃ nirīkṣantaḥ sthitā abhūvan /
K10jnalokau:70: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur jāmbūnadasuvarṇamayaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt /
K10jnalokau:71: nānāmahāmaṇiratnavṛkṣair divyaiḥ puṣpavṛkṣair vastravṛkṣair uragasāracandanagandhavṛkṣair alaṃkṛtaḥ,
K10jnalokau:78: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tato mahāmaṇiratnapadmagarbhāt siṃhāsanād imā gāthā niścaranti sma /
K10jnalokau:79: āgaccha niṣīda narendrarājā ahaṃ hi te puṇyabalena udgataḥ /
K10jnalokau:80: saṃpūrṇasaṃkalpa ahaṃ tvam adya saṃdhārayiṣye dvipadottamaṃ jinam // 1 //
K10jnalokau:81: mamātmabhāvo ratanāmayo hy ayaṃ ratnaikapadmaṃ mama madhyasaṃsthitam /
K10jnalokau:82: manoramaṃ tubhya kṛtena nāyakāḥ saṃkalpa pūrehi mamādya tāyinaḥ // 2 //
K10jnalokau:83: niṣadya ratnāmayi padmi asmiṃ śobhehi māṃ sarvam imaṃ ca lokam /
K10jnalokau:84: deśehi dharmaṃ bahuprāṇikoṭināṃ yaṃ śruta siṃhāsana īdṛśaṃ labhet // 3 //
K10jnalokau:85: raśmī sahasrā tava gātrasaṃbhavāḥ prabhāsayanto bahulokadhātum /
K10jnalokau:86: prāmodyajātasya hi lakṣaṇaṃ imaṃ samākramā mahya kṛtena nāyakāḥ // 4 //
K10jnalokau:88: kṣipraṃ niṣīdasva kuruṣva 'nugrahaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā dhārita aṣṭakoṭiyaḥ /
K10jnalokau:89: asmin pradeśe munināṃ svayaṃbhuvāṃ bhagavan pīhādya karotv anugraham // 5 //
K10jnalokau:92: atha khalu bhagavān utthāya pūrvakād āsanāt tatra mahāratnapadmagarbhe siṃhāsane niṣadya paryaṅkaṃbaddhī sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ svavalokayati sma /
K10jnalokau:93: sāmutkarṣikāyāś ca dharmadeśanāyās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nimittam akārṣīt /
K10jnalokau:94: tena khalu punaḥ samayena sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇa evaṃ cintayati sma /
K10jnalokau:95: yan nv ayaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto 'nutpādānirodhaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paripṛcchet,
K10jnalokau:97: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavato 'ntikān nimittaṃ viditvā teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya bhagavantam etad avocat /
K10jnalokau:106: samāgateme bahubodhisattvā jñānārthinaḥ tvāṃ ca vibho 'bhivanditum /
K10jnalokau:107: saṃpreṣitā lokavināyakebhir deśehi saddharmam udāram uttamam // 3 //
K10jnalokau:110: evam ukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam etad avocat /
K10jnalokau:112: sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ mañjuśrīs tathāgatam etam arthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase /
K10jnalokau:113: bahujanahitāya tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ pratipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya
K10jnalokau:114: hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ caitarhy āgatānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
K10jnalokau:116: anuttrāsas te mañjuśrīr asmin sthāne yogaḥ karaṇīyo na (JĀA 26)
K10jnalokau:121: tadyathā mañjuśrīr iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī mahāvaiḍūryamayī saṃsthitā bhavet /
K10jnalokau:122: evaṃ ca saṃsthitā bhaved yathā tasyāṃ vaiḍūryamayāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ trayastriṃśadbhavanasya,
K10jnalokau:125: śakraś ca devānām indras tatra divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ paricārayan saṃdṛśyet /
K10jnalokau:126: atha tasmin samaye devāḥ sarvajambūdvīpakāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ saṃcodayeyuḥ /
K10jnalokau:128: paśyatemaṃ śakraṃ devānām indraṃ vaijayante prāsāde divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍantaṃ ramantaṃ paricārayantam /
K10jnalokau:132: īdṛśeṣu vaijayanteṣu prāsādeṣu krīḍiṣyatha ramiṣyatha paricārayiṣyatha śakratvāni ca kariṣyatha /
K10jnalokau:134: yādṛśyā ca śakro devānām indro divyaiḥ paribhogaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūta iti /
K10jnalokau:135: atha mañjuśrīs te strīpuruṣadārakadārikās tasyāṃ vaiḍūryamayāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ trayastriṃśadbhavanasya,
K10jnalokau:137: śakrasya devānām indrasya pratibhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvāñjalipragṛhaṃ kuryuḥ /
K10jnalokau:139: gandhāṃś ca kṣiperann evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣante /
K10jnalokau:140: vayam apy evaṃrūpā bhavema yādṛśaḥ śakro devānām indraḥ,
K10jnalokau:141: vayam apy evaṃ vaijayante prāsāde krīḍema ramema parivārayema yathāyaṃ śakro devānām indra iti /
K10jnalokau:142: na ca te sattvā evaṃ saṃjānanti sma /
K10jnalokau:145: śakraś ca devānām indraḥ pariśuddhatvād mahāvaiḍūryasya pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyata iti /
K10jnalokau:146: te śakratvam abhinandanto dānāni ca dadati,
K10jnalokau:149: tatra ca trayastriṃśadbhavane pratibhāsa upapattaye kuśalamūlāni ca pariṇāmayanti /
K10jnalokau:150: yathā mañjuśrīḥ tatra ca vaiḍūryamayāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ nāsti tatra trayastriṃśadbhavanam,
K10jnalokau:153: api tu pariśuddhatvād mahāvaiḍūryasya saṃdṛśyate trayastriṃśadbhavanam,
K10jnalokau:156: sa cāsan notpanno na niruddhaḥ pariśuddhatvād mahāvaiḍūryasya pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate /
K10jnalokau:157: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ pariśuddhatvāc cittasya subhāvitatvād bhāvanāyāḥ sattvānāṃ tathāgatātmabhāvadarśanaṃ bhavati /
K10jnalokau:159: sa cābhūto 'nutpanno 'niruddho na bhāvo nābhāvo na dṛśyo nādṛśyo na lokyo nālokyo na caityo nācaityo na san nāsan /
K10jnalokau:160: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sattvās tathāgatapratibhāsam ārambaṇīkṛtvā puṣpāṇi kṣipanti,
K10jnalokau:163: vayam apy evaṃrūpā bhavema yādṛśas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti /
K10jnalokau:169: tadyathā mañjuśrīs tatra mahāvaiḍūryamayāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ śakrasya devānām indrasya pratibhāso neñjati,
K10jnalokau:175: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho neñjati,
K10jnalokau:182: atha ca pratibimba iva lokeṣu dṛśyate /
K10jnalokau:191: tadyathā mañjuśrīr devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ puṇyabalapariniṣpannānāṃ dharmaśabdānāṃ mahādharmadundubhir upari vaijayantasya prasādasyāntarīkṣagatā
K10jnalokau:194: atha ca punar mañjuśrīḥ sā mahādharmadundubhiḥ /
K10jnalokau:195: yasmin (JĀA 29) samaye devās trayastriṃśatkāyikā tīvrasatatasamitaṃ divyaiḥ kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogaiḥ pramattā bhavanti,
K10jnalokau:196: na bhūyaḥ sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ praviśya dharmaṃ saṃgāyanti,
K10jnalokau:197: śakraś ca yadā devānām indro divyaiḥ kāmakrīḍaratiparibhogaiḥ pramatto bhavati,
K10jnalokau:199: tasmin samaye mañjuśrīḥ sā mahādharmadundubhir adṛṣyā cānālokyā cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntāntarīkṣagatā tādṛśaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ niścārayati /
K10jnalokau:200: yena ca dharmaśabdena sarvān trayastriṃśatkāyikān devān svareṇa vijñapayati /
K10jnalokau:201: anityā mārṣā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā mā pramattacāriṇo bhavatha /
K10jnalokau:205: śūnyā mārṣāḥ sarvasaṃskārā mā pramādam āpadyatha /
K10jnalokau:206: duḥkham itaś cyavitānāṃ punar atropapattir bhaviṣyati /
K10jnalokau:212: mārṣā viharatha yūyaṃ punar ebhir evaṃ divyaiḥ kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogaiḥ,
K10jnalokau:214: tena khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samayena tasyā adṛśyā arūpiṇyā akalpyāyā avikalpāyāś cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntāyā
K10jnalokau:216: śabdena sarve trayastriṃśatkāyikā devāḥ saṃcoditā bhītās trastā udvignodvignāḥ (JĀA 30)
K10jnalokau:223: śakraś ca devānām indras tasmin samaye sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ praviśya dharmāsane niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayati /
K10jnalokau:224: yadā ca mañjuśrīr asurā devaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayanti /
K10jnalokau:225: tatra yadā trayastriṃśā devāḥ parābhavaṃ gacchanti /
K10jnalokau:227: yena śabdenāsurā bhītās trastā udvignodvignāḥ palāyanti /
K10jnalokau:228: na ca mañjuśrīs tasyā mahādharmadundubheḥ kaścit saṃpādayitā vātmabhāvo vā saṃvidyate /
K10jnalokau:230: atha ca mañjuśrīs trayastriṃśatkāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ pūrvaparikarmakṛtānāṃ mahādharmadundubheḥ śabdo niścarati /
K10jnalokau:232: yathā mañjuśrīs tasyā mahādundubher adṛśyo 'nātmabhāvo 'nālokyo 'sann abhūto 'cinto 'cetano 'nimitto (JĀA 31)
K10jnalokau:234: pūrvakarmavipākena trayastriṃśatkāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye śabdo niścarati /
K10jnalokau:236: sa ca dharmaśabdas trayastriṃśatkāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye saṃvartate /
K10jnalokau:237: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'dṛśyo 'nālokyo 'nātmabhāvo 'sann abhūto 'citto 'cetano 'nimitto 'rūpy aruto 'dvayo 'bhāvaś cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntaḥ /
K10jnalokau:238: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ pūrvakarmavipākena yathāśayādhimuktyā dharmaśabdaṃ niścarantaṃ saṃjānanti /
K10jnalokau:239: sa ca dharmaśabdaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye saṃvartate /
K10jnalokau:240: dharmasvaranirghoṣeṇa tathāgataghoṣasvara iti loke saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
K10jnalokau:242: atha ca dharmasvaraghoṣeṇa tathāgata iti prajñaptir loke saṃbhavati /
K10jnalokau:243: sattvānām eva pūrvakuśalakarmavipākena tathāgataśabdaṃ niścarantaṃ sattvāḥ saṃjānanti /
K10jnalokau:244: sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasukhajananārthaṃ pramattānāṃ ca saṃcodanārthaṃ śabdo niścarati /
K10jnalokau:245: te mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ śabdaṃ śrutvā tathāgataṃ saṃkalpayanti /
K10jnalokau:247: ādikarmikāṇāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṃ ca tathāgatārambaṇakuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ tathāgatavāk śrūyate /
K10jnalokau:248: api tv anutpanno 'niruddho mañjuśrīs tathāgato veditavyaḥ //
K10jnalokau:252: tadyathā mañjuśrīr nidāghakālāvasāne varṣāṇāṃ prathame māsy āgate sattvānāṃ pūrvakarmavipākena
K10jnalokau:254: upari vaihāyasy āntarīkṣa ākāśe tādṛśā vāyavo vānti /
K10jnalokau:257: tena ca sarvī mahāpṛthivī saṃtarpitā bhavati /
K10jnalokau:258: sarve jambūdvīpakāś ca sattvās tasmin samaye pramuditā bhavanti /
K10jnalokau:261: yasmin khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samaya upary antarīkṣād mahān udakaskandho na nipatati,
K10jnalokau:262: tasmin samaye sarvajambūdvīpakāḥ sattvā evaṃ cintayanti /
K10jnalokau:264: yadā tu mañjuśrīr upary antarīkṣād mahān vāriskandho mahāpṛthivyāṃ nipatati,
K10jnalokau:266: aho mahāmegho vāri pramuñcati saṃtarpayati mahāpṛthivīm iti /
K10jnalokau:267: na punar atra mañjuśrīr megho vā meghaprajñaptir vā vidyate /
K10jnalokau:268: vātasaṃjanito mañjuśrīr upary antarīkṣād mahān udakaskandho nipatati /
K10jnalokau:271: yathā mañjuśrīs tasya vāriskandhasyopary antarīkṣe vātasaṃkṣobheṇa saṃvāryamāṇasya muñcato vāri megha iti prajñaptir bhavati /
K10jnalokau:273: na punar atra mañjuśrīr meghaḥ saṃvidyate,
K10jnalokau:276: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ pūrvakuśalamūlasaṃbhāropacitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
K10jnalokau:278: ca sattvānāṃ nirvāṇamārgasaṃdarśanahetukānām āsaṃgapratibhānas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
K10jnalokau:280: sa yad bhāṣate tat sarvaṃ tathāvitathānanyathā,
K10jnalokau:281: tasya devamanuṣyeṣu tathāgata iti nāma kṛtam /
K10jnalokau:282: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ śabdo niścarati devamanuṣyeṣu yaduta tathāgata iti /
K10jnalokau:284: animitto mañjuśrīs tathāgato nimittāpagato na deśastho na videśasthaḥ,
K10jnalokau:286: tat khalu punar mañjuśrīs tathāgatapratibhāsaḥ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ dharmeṇa saṃtarpayitvā saṃpravārayitvā,
K10jnalokau:287: ādikarmikāṇāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ cānyeṣāṃ ca sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṃ nirvāṇavainayikānāṃ pūrvakarmavipākenādarśanābhāso bhavati /
K10jnalokau:290: na mañjuśrīs tathāgata utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā /
K10jnalokau:294: udakārambaṇenābhūtasya meghasyānutpannāniruddhasyāsato meghaprajñaptiḥ sthitā loke megha iti /
K10jnalokau:295: evam eva mañjuśrīr dharmadeśanārambaṇenābhūtasya tathāgatasyānutpannāniruddhasyāsata ādita evājātasya nāmaprajñaptiḥ sthitā loke tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti //
K10jnalokau:297: tadyathāpi mañjuśrīr mahābrahmānabhibhūr daśatrisāhasramahāsāhasravaśavartī divase divase sarvadevanikāyān vyavalokayati,
K10jnalokau:299: tena khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samayena tasya mahābrahmaṇo daśatrisāhasramahāsāhasravaśavartinaḥ sarvadevanikāyān vyavalokayataḥ,
K10jnalokau:300: sarvadevanikāyeṣu sarvadevaputrāḥ svakasvakān kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāṃs tyaktvā sarvatūryatāḍāvacarasaṃgītiṃ śamayitvā,
K10jnalokau:301: kāmakrīḍāratimanasikārotsṛṣṭāḥ sagauravā añjaliṃ pragṛhya mahābrahmāṇam animiṣaṃ vyavalokayanti /
K10jnalokau:302: sa ca mahābrahmā sarvadevanikāyeṣu muhūrtaṃ darśanaṃ dadāti /
K10jnalokau:303: te ca devaputrās tasmin samaye mahābrahmalokopapattim ākāṅkṣanti,
K10jnalokau:305: sa ca mañjuśrīr mahābrahmācyavamānas tato brahmavimānād anyam adhitiṣṭhati mahābrahmāṇaṃ
K10jnalokau:309: sa ca mañjuśrīr nirmito mahābrahmā divase divase sarvadevanikāyān vyavalokayati,
K10jnalokau:311: tena khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samayena sarveṣu devanikāyeṣu sarvadevaputrāḥ svakasvakān kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāṃs tyaktvā sarvatūryatāḍāvacarasaṃgītiṃ
K10jnalokau:312: kāmakrīḍāratimanasikārotsṛṣṭāḥ sagauravā añjaliṃ pragṛhya mahābrahmāṇam animiṣaṃ vyavalokayanti sma /
K10jnalokau:313: sa ca mahābrahmā sarvadevanikāyeṣu muhūrtaṃ darśanaṃ dadāti,
K10jnalokau:315: te ca devaputrās tasmin samaye mahābrahmalokopapattim ākāṅkṣanti,
K10jnalokau:319: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sarvadevanikāyeṣu darśanābhāso bhavati,
K10jnalokau:320: tasyaiva mahābrahmaṇaḥ pūrvakuśalamūlapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānena teṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ pūrvakuśalamūlopacayena /
K10jnalokau:321: na ca mañjuśrīs teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām evaṃ bhavati /
K10jnalokau:324: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śūnyo vaśiko 'bhūto 'nakṣaro 'ghoṣo 'deśo 'bhāvo 'cintyo 'nimittaś cittamanovijñānāpagato 'nutpanno 'niruddhaḥ /
K10jnalokau:325: atha ca punar mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānena, (JĀA 36)
K10jnalokau:327: sarvakuśalamūlādhiṣṭhānena lakṣaṇaśatasahasrālaṃkṛtas tathāgataḥ pratibimbam iva loke saṃdṛśyate,
K10jnalokau:329: na ca mañjuśrīr ādikarmikāṇāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṃ caivaṃ bhavati /
K10jnalokau:331: atha ca mañjuśrīs tathāgatātmabhāvāl lakṣaṇaśatasahasrālaṃkṛtāt sarvatathāgateryāpatheṣu śūnyeṣu nānāvidhivicitrāṇāṃ nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahādharmadeśanā niścarati /
K10jnalokau:332: sā ca dharmadeśanā sarvasattvānāṃ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye saṃvartate /
K10jnalokau:333: tatra ca tathāgataḥ samayaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ /
K10jnalokau:334: tad anenāpi te mañjuśrīḥ paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam,
K10jnalokau:337: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām ime gāthe abhāṣat /
K10jnalokau:339: anutpādadharmaḥ satataṃ tathāgataḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ sugatena sādṛśāḥ /
K10jnalokau:340: nimittagrāheṇa tu bālabuddhayo asatsu dharmeṣu caranti loke // 1 //
K10jnalokau:341: tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya /
K10jnalokau:342: na cātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarvaloke // 2 //
K10jnalokau:345: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ sūryaraśmayo jambūdvīpe pūrvataram eva tāvad mahāśailendrarājānam avabhāsayanti /
K10jnalokau:348: tataḥ paścād iha jambūdvīpe nimnān pṛthivīpradeśān avabhāsayanti /
K10jnalokau:349: te ca mañjuśrīḥ sūryaraśmayo na kalpayanti,
K10jnalokau:369: atha ca punar mañjuśrīḥ pṛthivyām uccanīcamadhyaviśeṣeṇa hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭāvabhāsasya cchāyā vaicitryaṃ bhavati /
K10jnalokau:370: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddho na kalpayati,
K10jnalokau:409: atha ca punar mañjuśrīs tathāgatasūryamaṇḍalajñānaraśmayas traidhātuke 'nantamadhyadharmadhātvapratihataraśmyavabhāsapramuktāḥ /
K10jnalokau:410: prasṛtāś ca raśmayaḥ pūrvataram eva mahāśailendrakalpādhyāśayānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kāye nipatanti /
K10jnalokau:413: tataḥ paścāt kuśalādhyāśayānāṃ yathādhimuktīnāṃ sattvānāṃ kāye nipatanti /
K10jnalokau:414: tataḥ paścād antaśo mithyātvaniyateṣu sattvasaṃtāneṣu kāye tathāgatasūryamaṇḍalaraśmayo nipatanti /
K10jnalokau:417: tatra ca tathāgato mañjuśrīḥ samaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ /
K10jnalokau:432: kuśalākuśalāśayānāṃ ca sattvānām āśayaṃ viditvā viśodhayiṣyāmi,
K10jnalokau:434: yāvad mithyātvaniyatānām api sattvānāṃ yathānurūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi /
K10jnalokau:438: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sattvānāṃ kuśalāśayasaṃtānavaicitryāt tathāgatajñānasūryamaṇḍalaraśmyavabhāsasya vaicitryaṃ bhavati //
K10jnalokau:441: tadyathā mañjuśrīr asti mahāsāgare sarvābhiprāyaparipūraṇaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ tad dhvajāgrāvabaddham /
K10jnalokau:445: tac ca mahāmaṇiratnaṃ na kalpayati na vikalpayati na cintayati na vicintayati,
K10jnalokau:447: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato na kalpayati na vikalpayati na cintayati na vicintayati,
K10jnalokau:476: na nāma na rūpaṃ na nimittam,
K10jnalokau:485: atha ca mañjuśrīs tathāgatajñānaratnam adhyāśayapariśuddhaṃ mahākaruṇādhvajāgrāvabaddham,
K10jnalokau:486: tato yo yathāśayādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ sa tathā dharmadeśanāṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānāti /
K10jnalokau:487: tatra ca tathāgataḥ samaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ //
K10jnalokau:490: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ pratiśrutkām anyarutavijñaptito niścarantīṃ sattvāḥ saṃjānanti /
K10jnalokau:491: sā ca nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
K10jnalokau:503: na pṛthivīdhātur nābdhātur na tejodhātur na vāyudhātuḥ,
K10jnalokau:524: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ pratiśrutkā nānārutaghoṣā nānādhyāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānārutaghoṣavijñaptito niścarati /
K10jnalokau:526: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nātīto nānāgato na pratyutpannaḥ,
K10jnalokau:538: na pṛthivīdhātur nābdhātur na tejodhātur na vāyudhātuḥ,
K10jnalokau:560: atha ca mañjuśrīr nānāvimuktāḥ sattvā nānādhyāśayavijñaptitas tathāgatavācaṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānanti //
K10jnalokau:563: tadyathāpi mañjuśrīḥ pṛthivīṃ niśritya pṛthivīṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vaipulyatām āpadyante /
K10jnalokau:568: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgataṃ niśritya tathāgataṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvakuśalamūlāni vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vaipulyatām āpadyante /
K10jnalokau:569: śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā mahāyānikānāṃ vā, anyeṣāṃ (JĀA 45)
K10jnalokau:571: yāni cānyāny antaśo mithyātvaniyatānāṃ kuśalamūlāni sarvāṇi tāni tathāgataṃ niśritya tathāgataṃ pratiṣṭhāya vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vaipulyatām āpadyante
K10jnalokau:588: tadyathā mañjuśrīr ākāśaṃ sarvatra samaṃ nirvikalpaṃ nirviśeṣam,
K10jnalokau:611: atha mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsthānasya hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭatayākāśaṃ hīnotkṛṣṭaṃ saṃjānanti /
K10jnalokau:612: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvatra samo nirviśeṣaḥ,
K10jnalokau:631: atha ca mañjuśrīr ye hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭāśayāḥ sattvās te hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti //
K10jnalokau:642: sattvaḥ, asya sattvasya hīnāṃ śrāvakayānakathāṃ kariṣye /
K10jnalokau:650: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ ca /
K10jnalokau:661: na mañjuśrīs tathāgatasya nāmarūpaniruktyānusāri vijñānaṃ pravartate /
K10jnalokau:665: sarvadharmasamatākoṭī mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ samaḥ sarvatra nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ,
K10jnalokau:672: yā mañjuśrīr anupalabdhiḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sā samatā,
K10jnalokau:678: evaṃ darśinaś ca viparyastāc cittacaitasikā na pravartante /
K10jnalokau:682: yadā na pracarati tadā na saṃcarati /
K10jnalokau:683: yadā na saṃcarati tadā na visarati /
K10jnalokau:694: yaś ca niyāmaprāptaḥ sa sarvadharmamanasikāraiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati /
K10jnalokau:695: yadā sarvadharmamanasikāraiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati tadā saṃvāśyo na bhavati /
K10jnalokau:696: yadā saṃvāśyo na bhavati tadā na bhavati na vibhavati /
K10jnalokau:697: yadā na bhavati na vibhavati tadā sthito dharmaprāpto bhavati /
K10jnalokau:698: yadā sthito dharmaprāpto bhavati tadā yoniśodharmaprayukto bhavati /
K10jnalokau:699: yoniśodharmaprayuktasya na kaścid dharmo 'sti yo na buddhadharmaḥ /
K10jnalokau:713: na tatra prayogo na pramāṇaṃ na phalasākṣātkriyā /
K10jnalokau:715: prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ cittaṃ tac cāgantukair upakleśair upakliśyate na ca prakṛtiḥ saṃkliśyate /
K10jnalokau:717: yā cāsaṃkleśatā tatra pratipakṣo nāsti yena pratipakṣeṇa kleśaprahāṇaṃ syāt /
K10jnalokau:719: na śuddhaḥ śudhyati śuddha eva saḥ /
K10jnalokau:722: yaś cāninditaḥ sa nandīprahāṇaṃ tatra sarvasnehā nirudhyante /
K10jnalokau:729: tathatāpratiṣṭhitāś ca sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtāś ca /
K10jnalokau:730: yā ca tathatā na tatra saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na dvayaprajñaptiḥ /
K10jnalokau:731: yatra na saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na dvayaprajñaptiḥ sā tathatā /
K10jnalokau:738: yā najātutathatā sā na saṃkliśyate na viśudhyate /
K10jnalokau:739: yā na saṃkliśyate na viśudhyate sā notpadyate na nirudhyate /
K10jnalokau:740: yā notpadyate na nirudhyate sā nirvāṇena samā /
K10jnalokau:741: yā nirvāṇena samā sā na saṃsarati na parinirvāti /
K10jnalokau:742: yā na saṃsarati na parinirvāti sā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā /
K10jnalokau:743: yā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā sā na hīnā na madhyā notkṛṣṭā /
K10jnalokau:744: yā na hīnā na madhyā notkṛṣṭā sā tathatā //
K10jnalokau:748: tathaiva tathatā cātmā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram /
K10jnalokau:757: yad arthānugamajñānaṃ vijñānānugamaṃ cedam ucyate jñānam /
K10jnalokau:762: yārthānugamajñānena vijñānānugamajñānena nītārthānugamajñānena ca sā dharmatā /
K10jnalokau:792: tatra bodhisattvena saṃkleśahetur vyavadānahetuś ca parijñātavyaḥ /
K10jnalokau:793: saṃkleśahetuviśuddhyā ca vyavadānaviśuddhyā ca na sthātavyam//
K10jnalokau:819: sarve te dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā niḥsattvā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpuruṣā niṣpudgalā asvāmikā aparigrahā nirvyāpārā māyopamā alakṣaṇā adhyātmopaśāntāḥ
K10jnalokau:830: na kaścin mañjuśrīr dharmaḥ saṃvidyate yasyotpādo nirodho vā bhavet //
K10jnalokau:834: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgatena bodhiḥ prāptā /
K10jnalokau:838: tatra katamad bhagavan mūlaṃ katamat pratiṣṭhānam /
K10jnalokau:841: tat tathāgatena mañjuśrīr bodhisamatayā sarvadharmasamatā jñātā /
K10jnalokau:842: tasmād ucyate mañjuśrīr amūlāpratiṣṭhānā tathāgatena bodhir abhisaṃbuddheti //
K10jnalokau:850: cakśur mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
K10jnalokau:853: sa cakṣuḥ śūnyam iti parijñāya rūpeṣu na dhāvati,
K10jnalokau:855: evaṃ śrotraṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
K10jnalokau:858: sa śrotraṃ śūnyam iti parijñāya śabdeṣu na dhāvati,
K10jnalokau:863: sa ghrāṇaṃ śūnyam iti parijñāya gandheṣu na dhāvati,
K10jnalokau:868: sa jihvā śūnyeti parijñāya raseṣu na (JĀA 55)
K10jnalokau:873: sa kāyaṃ śūnyam iti parijñāya spraṣṭavyeṣu na dhāvati,
K10jnalokau:875: mano mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
K10jnalokau:878: sa manaḥ śūnyam iti parijñāya dharmeṣu na dhāvati,
K10jnalokau:895: tathā cāvatārṣīd yathā tathatāyā nāpāraṃ na pāraṃ samanupaśyati /
K10jnalokau:918: bodhir mañjuśrīr nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā tryadhvasamā trimaṇḍalaparicchinnā /
K10jnalokau:923: sa cittamanovijñānāpratiṣṭhito na kalpayati na vikalpayati /
K10jnalokau:924: anavakalpayann avikalpayan nātītaṃ karoty anāgataṃ na manyate pratyutpannaṃ na prapañcayati //
K10jnalokau:934: yan mañjuśrīr na cittamanovijñānavijñeyaṃ tad asaṃskṛtam /
K10jnalokau:935: asaṃskṛtam ucyate yatra notpādo na sthitir na vyayaḥ /
K10jnalokau:961: bodhir mañjuśrīr na kāyenābhisambudhyate na cittena /
K10jnalokau:964: cittaṃ ca māyopamaṃ riktaṃ tuccham abhūtam asaṃskṛtam /
K10jnalokau:965: yo mañjuśrīr evaṃ kāyasya cittasya cāvabodhaḥ,
K10jnalokau:969: na mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ kāyena vā cittena vā dharmeṇa vā adharmeṇa vā bhūtena vābhūtena vā satyena vā mṛṣā vā vacanīyā //
K10jnalokau:973: na mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ kiñcit sthānaṃ yena ca vyavahāraṃ gacchet /
K10jnalokau:974: yathā mañjuśrīr ākāśasthānam asaṃskṛtam anutpannam aniruddham avacanīyaṃ tathā mañjuśrīr bodhir asaṃskṛtāsthānānutpannāniruddhāvacanīyā /
K10jnalokau:975: yathā mañjuśrīr bhūtaṃ parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ sarvadharmair avacanīyam,
K10jnalokau:976: evam eva mañjuśrīr bodhir bhūtā parigaveṣyamāṇā sarvadharmair avacanīyā /
K10jnalokau:991: abhisaṃbudhya cakṣuṣo 'nanugrahāya rūpānupalabdhitaś cakṣurvijñānaṃ na pratiṣṭhitam /
K10jnalokau:998: tenāpratiṣṭhitavijñānas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //
K10jnalokau:1000: katamāni catvāri yad uta rūpaṃ sattvānāṃ cittasya pratiṣṭhānam /
K10jnalokau:1001: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā mañjuśrīḥ sattvānāṃ cittasya pratiṣṭhānam /
K10jnalokau:1002: tāni khalu punar imāni mañjuśrīś catvāri cittasya pratiṣṭhānāni tathāgatenānutpannāny aniruddhānīti jñātāni //
K10jnalokau:1005: bodhir iti mañjuśrīḥ śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanam /
K10jnalokau:1006: yayā śūnyatayā mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ śūnyā tayā śūnyatayā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ /
K10jnalokau:1009: api tu khalu punar mañjuśrīr ekanayam etad yad uta śūnyatā vā bodhir vā /
K10jnalokau:1010: yatra mañjuśrīr na śūnyatā na bodhiḥ,
K10jnalokau:1011: na tatra mañjuśrīḥ kiṃcid dvayaṃ yena dvayena śūnyatā vā bodhir vā dvidhākriyate /
K10jnalokau:1013: advayā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā alakṣaṇā advaidhīkārā anāmāno 'nimittāś cittamanovijñānāpagatā anutpannā aniruddhā (JĀA 61)
K10jnalokau:1015: yat punar ucyate mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam iti,
K10jnalokau:1017: na punar atra mañjuśrīḥ paramārthataḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yaḥ śūnyam ity ucyate /
K10jnalokau:1018: yathā mañjuśrīr ākāśam ākāśam ity ucyate,
K10jnalokau:1020: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ śūnyaṃ śūnyam ity ucyate,
K10jnalokau:1022: anāmakā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmānām ataś ca vyākriyante /
K10jnalokau:1023: na mañjuśrīr nāma deśasthaṃ na pradeśasthaṃ /
K10jnalokau:1025: nāmnā yo dharmo 'bhilapyate so 'pi dharmo na deśastho na pradeśasthaḥ /
K10jnalokau:1026: evam ete mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmās tathāgatena jñātā ādita evājātā anutpannā aniruddhā alakṣaṇāś cittamanovijñānāpagatā anakṣarā aghoṣāḥ /
K10jnalokau:1033: viṣamaṃ bodhir api na samā na viṣamā /
K10jnalokau:1035: yasya mañjuśrīr dharmasya na bhūtapariniṣpattir nāsau samo na viṣamo vā vaktavya iti /
K10jnalokau:1036: hi mañjuśrīs tathāgatena sarvadharmā asamā aviṣamā abhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
K10jnalokau:1037: tathā cābhisaṃbuddhā athāṇur api na samīkṛto na viṣamīkṛtaḥ /
K10jnalokau:1038: yādṛśā eva te dharmāḥ tādṛśā eva vijñātāḥ /
K10jnalokau:1039: bhūtajñānena katamac ca mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā anutpannāniruddhāḥ,
K10jnalokau:1043: asvāmikā aparigrahāś ca mañjuśrīḥ prati vigacchanti /
K10jnalokau:1044: iti hi mañjuśrīḥ saṃbhavanti vibhavanti ca pratītya dharme vartante na cātra kaścid vartayitā /
K10jnalokau:1045: tad ucyate dharmopacchedāya tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayatīti //
K10jnalokau:1051: yathā bodhis tathā rūpaṃ tathatān na vyativartate /
K10jnalokau:1052: yathā bodhis tathā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ tathatān na vyativartate /
K10jnalokau:1053: yathā bodhis tathā pṛthivīdhātus tathatān na vyativartate /
K10jnalokau:1054: (JĀA 63) yathā bodhis tathāpdhātus tejodhātus tathatān na vyativartate /
K10jnalokau:1055: yathā bodhis tathā cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātus tathatān na vyativartate /
K10jnalokau:1056: yathā hi mañjuśrīr bodhis tathā śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ śrotravijñānadhātuḥ,
K10jnalokau:1060: manodhātur dharmadhātur manovijñānadhātus tathatān na vyativartante /
K10jnalokau:1063: sā tathāgatena yathāvadabhisaṃbuddhā yathaiva pūrvāt tathā paścāt tathā madhye /
K10jnalokau:1068: na cātra mañjuśrīr ekatvaṃ vā bahutvaṃ copalabhyate //
K10jnalokau:1073: ākāro mañjuśrīr ucyata ārambhaḥ sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām /
K10jnalokau:1088: anāsravatā mañjuśrīr ucyate caturṇām āsravānāṃ vigamaḥ /
K10jnalokau:1114: yac cāvidyāyā asamutthānaṃ tad dvādaśānāṃ bhavāṅgānām asamutthānam /
K10jnalokau:1125: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati /
K10jnalokau:1126: yo dharmaṃ paśyati sa tathāgataṃ paśyati /
K10jnalokau:1127: tathā ca paśyati yathā parigaveṣyamāṇo na kiṃcit paśyati /
K10jnalokau:1131: na cārambaṇaṃ paśyati tadā bhūtam paśyati /
K10jnalokau:1132: evam ete dharmās tathāgatena saṃbuddhāḥ samatayā samāḥ //
K10jnalokau:1166: iti hi mañjuśrīḥ śuddhir vimalam anaṅgaṇam ity ekapadesmin samavasaranti /
K10jnalokau:1171: yaś copaśamaḥ sa munir ity ucyate /
K10jnalokau:1172: iti hi mañjuśrīr yathākāśaṃ tathā bodhiḥ /
K10jnalokau:1182: tatra mañjuśrīs tathāgatasyaivaṃrūpān sarvadharmān abhisaṃbuddhasya sattvānāṃ (JĀA 67)
K10jnalokau:1184: śuddhā vimalā anaṅgaṇā vikrīḍitā nāma sattveṣu mahākaruṇāḥ pravartate //
K10jnalokau:1188: yadā mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo na kṣayāya notpādāya nākṣayāya nānutpādāya nānyatkṣīṇakṣayāya ca manyate,
K10jnalokau:1191: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo 'tītaṃ cittaṃ kṣīṇam iti na carati /
K10jnalokau:1192: anāgataṃ cittam asaṃprāptam iti na carati /
K10jnalokau:1193: pratyutpannaṃ cittaṃ sthitam iti na carati /
K10jnalokau:1195: evaṃ caran mañjuśrīr bodhisattvaś carati bodhisattvacaryāyām /
K10jnalokau:1196: dānaṃ mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ sattvāś ca tathāgataś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram /
K10jnalokau:1198: śīlaṃ mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ sattvāś ca tathāgataś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram /
K10jnalokau:1200: evaṃ kṣāntir bodhiḥ sattvāś ca tathāgataś ca,
K10jnalokau:1201: vīryaṃ bodhiḥ sattvāś ca tathāgataś ca, (JĀA 68)
K10jnalokau:1202: dhyānaṃ bodhiḥ sattvāś ca tathāgataś ca,
K10jnalokau:1203: evaṃ prajñā bodhis tathāgataś ca sattvāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram /
K10jnalokau:1204: evaṃ caran mañjuśrīr bodhisattvaś carati bodhisattvacaryāyām /
K10jnalokau:1205: sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo na rūpaṃ śūnyam iti carati nāśūnyam iti /
K10jnalokau:1206: evaṃ caran mañjuśrīr bodhisattvaś carati bodhisattvacaryāyām /
K10jnalokau:1209: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ śūnyam iti carati nāśūnyam iti /
K10jnalokau:1210: evaṃ caran mañjuśrīr bodhisattvaś carati bodhisattvacaryāyām /
K10jnalokau:1213: sa na kaścin mañjuśrīr dharmo vidyate,
K10jnalokau:1214: yasya parijñānaṃ vā prahāṇaṃ vā bhāvanā vā sākṣātkriyā vā bhavet /
K10jnalokau:1221: yaś ca yathāvat kṣayaḥ sa na kasyacit kṣayaḥ /
K10jnalokau:1222: yasya na kasyacit kṣayas tad asaṃskṛtam /
K10jnalokau:1223: yad asaṃskṛtaṃ tatra notpādo na nirodhaḥ /
K10jnalokau:1225: utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā sthitaivaiṣā dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmadhātuḥ /
K10jnalokau:1226: yathā dharmadhātusthitis tathāgatajñānaṃ na pravṛttaṃ na nivṛttam /
K10jnalokau:1227: īdṛśena dharmanayapraveśena āsravā notpadyante na nirudhyante /
K10jnalokau:1228: āsravakṣaya iti mañjuśrīr vyavahārarutākṣarasaṃketaprajñaptir eṣā nātra kaścid dharma utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā //
K10jnalokau:1232: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ
K10jnalokau:1233: jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya gāthābhir
K10jnalokau:1244: sadā samāhitaś cāsi gacchaṃs tiṣṭhaṃ śayann api /
K10jnalokau:1246: samaṃ kṣeṣi samaṃ yāsi samatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
K10jnalokau:1247: samatāṃ na vikopesi nirālamba namo 'stu te // 6 //
K10jnalokau:1278: astīti nocyate 'rthajñaiḥ nāstīty api tu nocyate /
K10jnalokau:1282: jitās te mānasā doṣāḥ śārīrāś ca caturvidhāḥ /
K10jnalokau:1287: anāsravā te smṛtiḥ sūkṣmā bhūtābhūteṣu tanmayā /
K10jnalokau:1290: na cātmaparasaṃjñā te nirālamba namo 'stu te // 26 //
K10jnalokau:1293: anārambaṇaṃ ca taccittaṃ svabhāvena na vidyate /
K10jnalokau:1297: cittaṃ na labdhaṃ buddhehi atyantāya kadācana /
K10jnalokau:1298: sarvadharmā ca sarvajña nirālamba namo 'stu te // 30 //
K10jnalokau:1300: māyopamāḥ sarvadharmā māyā caiva na vidyate /
K10jnalokau:1303: lokaṃ na ca vikalpeṣi nirālamba namo 'stu te // 32 //
K10jnalokau:1305: śūnyaṃ ca śūnyam ākhyāsi nirālamba namo 'stu te // 33 //
K10jnalokau:1316: acalaṃ vetsi nirvāṇaṃ nirālamba namo 'stu te // 38 //
K10jnalokau:1320: vetsi sarvajña sarvatra nirālamba namo 'stu te // 40 //
K10jnalokau:1322: vandāmi tvāṃ daśabala oghatīrṇaṃ vandāmi tvāṃ abhayadadaṃ viśāradam /
K10jnalokau:1323: dharmeṣu āveṇikaniścayaṃ gataṃ vandāmi tvāṃ sarvajagasya nāyakam // 1 //
K10jnalokau:1325: vandāmi saṃyojanabandhanacchidaṃ vandāmi tvāṃ pāragataṃ sthule sthitam /
K10jnalokau:1326: vandāmi tvāṃ khinnajagasya nāyakaṃ vandāmi saṃsāragata-ṃ-aniśritam // 2 //
K10jnalokau:1328: jale ruhaṃ vā salilair na lipyase niṣevitā te munir buddha śūnyatā // 3 //
K10jnalokau:1329: vivekatā śāstṛpadaṃ niruttaraṃ vande nirālamba mahaughatīrṇam /
K10jnalokau:1330: vibhāvitā sarvanimitta sarvaśo na te kahiṃcit praṇidhānu vidyate // 4 //
K10jnalokau:1331: acintiyaṃ buddha mahānubhāvaṃ vandāmi ākāśasamam aniśritam /
K10jnalokau:1332: vandāmi te sarvaguṇāgradhāri vandāmi tvāṃ merum ivodgataśriyam // 5 //
K10jnalokau:1335: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriye kumārabhūtāya sādhukāram adāt /
K10jnalokau:1338: mañjuśrīr na buddhā rūpato draṣṭavyā na dharmato na lakṣaṇato na dharmadhātutaḥ /
K10jnalokau:1341: na śrutā na pūjitā na pūjyante /
K10jnalokau:1342: na buddhā kasyacid dharmasya ekatvaṃ vā bahutvaṃ vā kurvanti /
K10jnalokau:1345: na buddhaiḥ kaścid dharmo dṛṣṭo na śruto na smṛto na vijñāto nājñātaḥ /
K10jnalokau:1360: (1) yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīr bodhisattvaḥ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamān sattvān pratyekajinatve sthāpayed idaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ nādhimuktaḥ /
K10jnalokau:1361: yo cānyo mañjuśrīr bodhisattva imaṃ dharmaparyāyam adhimucyet /
K10jnalokau:1363: kaḥ punar vādo ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhed lekhāpayed vā /
K10jnalokau:1364: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
K10jnalokau:1365: (2) yāvanto mañjuśrīr bodhisattva trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ saṃvidyante,
K10jnalokau:1381: bodhicittam utpādya ekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgāsikatāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ
K10jnalokau:1393: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sarvabuddhaviṣayāvatārajñānālokālaṃkāraṃ śrutvādhimucyed avataret pattīyet paribuddhet /
K10jnalokau:1394: antaśa ekām api gāthām uddiśed ayaṃ tato saṃkhyeyataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet /
K10jnalokau:1397: teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śatatamām api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K10jnalokau:1406: (1) yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīr gṛhī bodhisattvo gaṅgāsikatāsaṃkhyeyān buddhān bodhisattvān saśrāvakasaṃghān gaṅgāsikatāsaṃkhyeyān (JĀA 80)
K10jnalokau:1408: yaś cānyaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ śīlavān āśayasaṃpanno 'ntaśo yas tiryagyonigate 'pi sattva ekasyāpy ālopaṃ dadyāt /
K10jnalokau:1409: tasya puṇyābhisaṃskārasya pūrvakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamām api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K10jnalokau:1414: (2) sacen mañjuśrīs trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvāḥ pravrajitāḥ śīlavanta āśayaśuddhāḥ,
K10jnalokau:1415: tata ekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīsikatāsaṃkhyeyān buddhān bodhisattvān saśrāvakasaṃghāṃś cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariskārair
K10jnalokau:1417: yas teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāro bhaved dānamayaḥ /
K10jnalokau:1418: yo vānyo bodhisattva āśayaśuddho śīlavān gṛhī vā pravrajito vā,
K10jnalokau:1419: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvādhimucyet pattīyed vā likheta lekhāpayed vā /
K10jnalokau:1421: teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K10jnalokau:1425: (3) sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo mahāsattvas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇāṃ kṛtvā buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyo dānaṃ dadyāt
K10jnalokau:1427: yo vānyo bodhisattva imān dharmaparyāyān antaśaś catuṣpādikāṃ gāthāṃ bodhisattvasya deśayet /
K10jnalokau:1428: asya puṇyābhisaṃskārasya sa pūrvakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamām api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K10jnalokau:1433: (4) tiṣṭhantu tāvan mañjuśrīḥ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān dānaṃ dadataḥ puṇyābhisaṃskārāḥ /
K10jnalokau:1435: tata ekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgāsikatāsaṃkhyeyāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jāmbūnadasuvarṇamayāni,
K10jnalokau:1439: ucchritacchatradhvajapatākābhir gaṅgānadīsikatāsaṃkhyeyebhyo buddhebhyo divase divase dānaṃ dadyāt /
K10jnalokau:1440: evaṃ dadaṅ gaṅgāsikatāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān dānaṃ dadyāt /
K10jnalokau:1441: yo vānyo bodhisattva imaṃ dharmaparyāyam adhimucyānyasya bodhisattvasyeto dharmaparyāyād antaśa ekām api catuṣpādikāṃ gāthāṃ deśayed avatārayed (JĀA 82) vā /
K10jnalokau:1442: asya puṇyābhisaṃskārasya sa pūrvakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāras teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānamayaḥ śatatamām api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K10jnalokau:1452: (1) tadyathā mañjuśrīs traidhātukaparyāpannāḥ sarvasattvā narakatiryakpretayamalokopapannā bhaveyuḥ /
K10jnalokau:1453: atha gṛhī bodhisattvas tān sarvān narakatiryakpretayamalokād uddhṛtya pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1454: yo vānyo bodhisattvaḥ pravrajito 'ntaśas tiryagyonigate 'pi sattva ekam ālopaṃ dadyāt /
K10jnalokau:1455: ayaṃ tato bahutaram asaṃkhyeyataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavayāt //
K10jnalokau:1456: (2) sacen mañjuśrīr daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ pravrajitā bodhisattvā bhaveyuḥ /
K10jnalokau:1457: tata ekaiko bodhisattvo daśasu dikṣv ekaikasmin digbhāge daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyet /
K10jnalokau:1458: ekaikaṃ ca tathāgataṃ sabodhisattvaṃ saśrāvakaṃ daśasu buddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamaṇurajaḥsamān (JĀA 83)
K10jnalokau:1460: ekaikasya ca tathāgatasya divase divase buddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn vaśirājamaṇiratnapratipūrṇān kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt /
K10jnalokau:1461: yo vānyo bodhisattvo 'smin dharmaparyāye 'dhimukto 'ntaśas tiryagyonigate 'pi sattva ekam ālopaṃ dadyāt /
K10jnalokau:1462: asya puṇyābhisaṃskārasya pūrvakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāras teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānamayaḥ śatatamām api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K10jnalokau:1471: avaivartikānāṃ bodhisattvānām iyaṃ mudrā yadutāsya dharmaparyāyasya śravaḥ //
K10jnalokau:1474: (1) sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sattvān śraddhānusāritve pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1475: yo vānyo bodhisattva ekaṃ sattvam arthānusāritve pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1477: (2) sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo daśadikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvān arthānusāritve pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1478: yo vānyo bodhisattva ekaṃ sattvaṃ dharmānusāritve pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1480: (3) sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sattvān dharmānusāritve pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1481: yo vānyo bodhisattva ekaṃ sattvaṃ srotāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1483: (4) sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvān srota-āpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1484: yo vānyo bodhisattva ekaṃ sattvaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1486: (5) sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1487: yo vānyo bodhisattva ekaṃ sattvam ānāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1489: (6) sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvān anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1490: yo (JĀA 85) vānyo bodhisattva ekaṃ sattvaṃ arhatve pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1492: (7) sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvān arhatve pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1493: yo vānyo bodhisattva ekaṃ sattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1495: (8) sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvān pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1496: yo vānyo bodhisattva ekaṃ sattvaṃ bodhicitte pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1498: (9) sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvān bodhicitte pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1499: yo vānyo bodhisattva ekaṃ sattvam avaivartikatve pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1502: (10) sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvān avaivartikatve pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10jnalokau:1503: yo vānyo bodhisattva imaṃ dharmaparyāyam adhimuktaḥ likhāpayitvā parebhyo vistareṇa saṃprakāśayet,
K10jnalokau:1504: antaśa ekaṃ sattvam apy asmin dharmaparyāye 'vatārayet /
K10jnalokau:1508: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām imā gāthā abhāṣat /
K10jnalokau:1509: yo bodhisattvo daśabuddhakoṭināṃ saddharmaṃ dhārayet kṣayāntakāle /
K10jnalokau:1510: sūtraṃ ca yo 'nyaḥ śṛṇuyāt sagauravād idaṃ tataḥ puṇyamahāntaṃ viśeṣayet // 1 //
K10jnalokau:1511: yo buddhakoṭīdaśa pūjayed ṛddhyā samākramya daśāsu dikṣu /
K10jnalokau:1512: vandāpayet sa puruṣāṃś ca sarvān kṛtvā kṛpāṃ sarvasukheṣv agṛddhaḥ // 2 //
K10jnalokau:1514: yaś cedaṃ sūtraṃ jinadharmasūcakaṃ parasya deśeta muhūrtakaṃ pi /
K10jnalokau:1515: prasannacittaḥ sugatasya śāsana idaṃ tataḥ puṇyaphalaṃ viśiṣyate // 3 //
K10jnalokau:1517: sa tīkṣṇaprajñaś ca mahābalaś ca buddhāna bhūmiṃ labhate ca śīghram // 4 //
K10jnalokau:1518: kathāṃ śruṇitvā sugatānam īdṛśaṃ saṃśrāvayed yaś ca dvitīyasattve /
K10jnalokau:1519: teṣāṃ ca buddhāna narottamānāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ nirupādhiśeṣe // 5 //
K10jnalokau:1521: chatraiḥ patākais tatha ghaṇṭaśabdaiḥ pariṇāhavante hi yathā bhavāgram // 6 //
K10jnalokau:1523: icche tv ayaṃ kaścid iha bodhisattvaḥ sūtraṃ śruṇitvā ima evarūpam /
K10jnalokau:1524: kāye pratiṣṭhāpayi pustake vā idaṃ tataḥ puṇyaphalaṃ viśiṣyate // 7 //
K10jnalokau:1525: yo bodhisattvo imu dharmu dhārayed apanītamāccharyamalo viśāradaḥ /
K10jnalokau:1526: puṇyaṃ bhavet tasya hi aprameyaṃ labheta bodhiṃ ca yathepsitena // 8 //
K10jnalokau:1527: idaṃ hi sūtraṃ sugataiḥ praśastaṃ parigṛhītaṃ bahubodhisattvaiḥ /
K10jnalokau:1528: tathāgatānām iha-m-ātmabhāva ākāśadhātve hi sarveṣu darśitaḥ // 9 //
K10jnalokau:1531: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā āryamañjuśrīr bodhisattvaḥ,
K10jnalokau:1532: te ca daśadiganantāparyantāśeṣalokadhātusaṃnipatitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā iti ca mahāśrāvakāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti // //
K10jnalokau:1534: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
K10jnalokau:1535: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
K10jnalokau:1536: deyadharmo 'yaṃ pravaramahāyānayāyinaḥ bhikṣuśīladhvajasya ca tatra puṇyaṃ tad bhavatv ācāryopādhyāyamātāpitṛpūrvaṃgamaṃ kṛtvā sakalasattvarāśer anuttarajñānaphalāvāptaya iti //
K10jnalokau:1537: mahārājādhirājaśrīmadgopāladevarājye saṃvat 12 śrāvaṇadine 30 likhitam idaṃ upasthāyakacāṇḍokeneti // śrī //
